entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Pitt Meadows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:34 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pitt Meadows 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: 5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 5.4°C
Wind: E 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
